data.lyric:
[ti:Love Someone]
[ar:Lukas Graham]
[al:Love Someone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Love Someone - Lukas Graham
[00:01.01]There are days
[00:05.12]I wake up and I pinch myself
[00:08.04]You're with me not someone else
[00:12.13]And I am scared yeah I'm so scared
[00:16.38]That it's all a dream
[00:23.83]'Cause you still look perfect as days go by
[00:29.74]Even the worst ones you make me smile
[00:35.20]I'd stop the world if it gave us time
[00:44.11]'Cause when you love someone
[00:47.63]You open up your heart
[00:49.77]When you love someone
[00:52.32]You may grow
[00:55.51]If you love someone
[00:58.61]And you're not afraid to lose them
[01:00.88]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[01:06.51]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[01:13.67]When you say
[01:17.64]You love the way I make you feel
[01:20.58]Everything becomes so real
[01:24.66]Don't be scared no don't be scared
[01:29.00]'Cause you're all I need
[01:36.30]And you still look perfect as days go by
[01:42.26]Even the worst ones you make me smile
[01:47.86]I'd stop the world if it gave us time
[01:56.66]'Cause when you love someone
[02:00.14]You open up your heart
[02:02.44]When you love someone
[02:04.86]You may grow
[02:08.00]If you love someone
[02:11.14]And you're not afraid to lose them
[02:13.37]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[02:19.01]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[02:26.93]All my life
[02:30.20]I thought it'd be hard to find
[02:32.14]The one 'til I found you
[02:35.81]And I find it bittersweet
[02:41.45]'Cause you gave me something to lose
[02:46.84]But when you love someone
[02:50.45]You open up your heart
[02:52.73]When you love someone
[02:55.05]You may grow
[02:58.29]If you love someone
[03:01.43]And you're not afraid to lose them
[03:03.70]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[03:09.23]You'll probably never love someone like I do
[03:14.78]You'll probably never love someone like I do
data.trans:
[ti:Love Someone]
[ar:Lukas Graham]
[al:Love Someone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.01]有段时间
[00:05.12]我每天醒来都要掐一下自己
[00:08.04]确定你就在我身边 而不是陪着别人
[00:12.13]我很害怕
[00:16.38]怕这一切只是美梦一场
[00:23.83]因为岁月的流逝并没有带走你美丽的容颜
[00:29.74]就算最难熬的时候 你也能让我笑起来
[00:35.20]如果我能掌控时间 我会让地球停止转动
[00:44.11]因为当你爱上一个人时
[00:47.63]你就会对他敞开心扉
[00:49.77]当你爱上一个人时
[00:52.32]你就会成长
[00:55.51]如果你爱上一个人
[00:58.61]你就会不顾一切 不计得失
[01:00.88]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[01:06.51]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[01:13.67]当你对我说
[01:17.64]你喜欢我给你的感觉时
[01:20.58]一切都变得那么真实
[01:24.66]不要害怕
[01:29.00]因为我只需要你
[01:36.30]因为岁月的流逝并没有带走你美丽的容颜
[01:42.26]就算最难熬的时候 你也能让我笑起来
[01:47.86]如果我能掌控时间 我会让地球停止转动
[01:56.66]因为当你爱上一个人时
[02:00.14]你就会对他敞开心扉
[02:02.44]当你爱上一个人时
[02:04.86]你就会成长
[02:08.00]如果你爱上一个人
[02:11.14]你就会不顾一切 不计得失
[02:13.37]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[02:19.01]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[02:26.93]一直以来
[02:30.20]我一直认为 要想找到真爱很难
[02:32.14]直到我遇见了你
[02:35.81]我尝到了爱情苦乐参半的味道
[02:41.45]你让我尝到了失去的滋味
[02:46.84]但是当你爱上一个人时
[02:50.45]你就会对他敞开心扉
[02:52.73]当你爱上一个人时
[02:55.05]你就会成长
[02:58.29]如果你爱上一个人
[03:01.43]你就会不顾一切 不计得失
[03:03.70]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[03:09.23]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
[03:14.78]在爱情里 你也许永远不会像我这样疯狂
